baseDatasetId.title: Base dataset
baseDatasetId.description: This dataset ID that will serve as base and collect the unique items.

otherDatasetId.title: Other dataset
otherDatasetId.description: Only non-existing items from base will be ouput using this other dataset

uniqueFields.title: Data fields
uniqueFields.description: Unique fields to create a compound key. For example, an unique ID field might not be unique, so you place two fields that make the item itself unique

maxBufferSize.title: Max Buffer size
maxBufferSize.description: How many items to buffer in memory before outputting it
